name: Equine Escapades
description:
It's Christmas time and and Santa stopped by for a visit! Gather your friends and open as many presents as you can but don't forget to share with those important to you! Oh and Santa knows if you've been a naughty horse so be careful while opening presents!

1-4 Players

The Mac/Linux builds may contain bugs; this game was made and tested on Windows PCs.

Credits:

Mary Burbridge: Character Art, Trees, UI Design

Timothy J Cobb: Level Design, Lighting, Environmental Models

Portfolio: https://www.timothyjcobb.net/

Adam Zmudzinski: Programmer, Particles
